text: 9.19 Kis 24.3-8, Wkp 14.4-7, 16.14-15 Mosis God takaw kɨles agak ak ñu kɨl tɨkak okok, ne binɨb okok mɨdupsek kɨlop agñɨ day juwak.9.19-20 Kis 24.6-8 Agñɨ day juwɨl, chag bulmakaw ñɨluk chag meme pakɨl nɨkɨm dɨl, ñɨg ogɨnap sek dɨl tɨg adɨk madɨk gak. Mab lek kɨd ak dɨl, nag olap dak. Nag anɨb ak, chag sipsip wɨj dɨl nag malɨkɨl, kalom pogɨlak ak. Pen nag anɨb ak dɨl, mab kɨd anɨb ak day alaŋ tun gɨl, ñɨg nɨkɨm anɨb ak tawak. Tawɨl, mɨj ñu kɨl tɨkak anɨb ak sek, binɨb ap yelak okok sek askoy pakñek
